body_html:
Hi, have you met the error below when you ran resnet50_trainer.py?

E0726 08:00:33.794396 27793 operator.cc:474] Shape inference error: [enforce fail at conv_pool_op_base.h:630] in_size + *pad_head + *pad_tail >= dkernel. 2 vs 3
E0726 08:00:33.794942 27793 operator.cc:475] Operator: input: "gpu_0/conv1_spatbn_relu" output: "gpu_0/pool1" name: "" type: "MaxPool" arg { name: "order" s: "NCHW" } arg { name: "kernel" i: 3 } arg { name: "stride" i: 2 } arg { name: "ws_nbytes_limit" i: 67108864 } arg { name: "cudnn_exhaustive_search" i: 1 } device_option { device_type: 1 cuda_gpu_id: 0 } engine: "CUDNN"
E0726 08:00:33.794971 27793 operator.cc:476] Returning empty results.

This is my command

python caffe2/python/examples/resnet50_trainer.py --train_data /home/imagenet_datasets/lmdb/ilsvrc12_train_lmdb/ --batch_size 32 --num_gpus 2

I use cuda9.1 and cudnn7.0.5 in my os.
Thank you.
body_text:
Hi, have you met the error below when you ran resnet50_trainer.py?

E0726 08:00:33.794396 27793 operator.cc:474] Shape inference error: [enforce fail at conv_pool_op_base.h:630] in_size + *pad_head + *pad_tail >= dkernel. 2 vs 3
E0726 08:00:33.794942 27793 operator.cc:475] Operator: input: "gpu_0/conv1_spatbn_relu" output: "gpu_0/pool1" name: "" type: "MaxPool" arg { name: "order" s: "NCHW" } arg { name: "kernel" i: 3 } arg { name: "stride" i: 2 } arg { name: "ws_nbytes_limit" i: 67108864 } arg { name: "cudnn_exhaustive_search" i: 1 } device_option { device_type: 1 cuda_gpu_id: 0 } engine: "CUDNN"
E0726 08:00:33.794971 27793 operator.cc:476] Returning empty results.

This is my command

python caffe2/python/examples/resnet50_trainer.py --train_data /home/imagenet_datasets/lmdb/ilsvrc12_train_lmdb/ --batch_size 32 --num_gpus 2

I use cuda9.1 and cudnn7.0.5 in my os.
Thank you.
body:
Hi, have you met the error below when you ran resnet50_trainer.py?

> E0726 08:00:33.794396 27793 operator.cc:474] Shape inference error: [enforce fail at conv_pool_op_base.h:630] in_size + *pad_head + *pad_tail >= dkernel. 2 vs 3
E0726 08:00:33.794942 27793 operator.cc:475] Operator: input: "gpu_0/conv1_spatbn_relu" output: "gpu_0/pool1" name: "" type: "MaxPool" arg { name: "order" s: "NCHW" } arg { name: "kernel" i: 3 } arg { name: "stride" i: 2 } arg { name: "ws_nbytes_limit" i: 67108864 } arg { name: "cudnn_exhaustive_search" i: 1 } device_option { device_type: 1 cuda_gpu_id: 0 } engine: "CUDNN"
E0726 08:00:33.794971 27793 operator.cc:476] Returning empty results.

This is my command

> python caffe2/python/examples/resnet50_trainer.py --train_data /home/imagenet_datasets/lmdb/ilsvrc12_train_lmdb/ --batch_size 32 --num_gpus 2

 I use cuda9.1 and cudnn7.0.5 in my os.
Thank you.
